name: Slots & Sorcery
description:
You've played roguelike deck builders, but have you played a roguelike slots builder?!

In Slots & Sorcery go on an adventure with Diamond Dan and Cherry Carl as they battle monsters the only way they know how: with slots!

Earn new weapons, armor, and items. Manipulate the reels to your advantage. Spin big combos to deal massive damage! Can you defeat the monsters in the forest and save the town?

Slots & Sorcery was made for TOJam 2022.
